description.en:
Wanderlust is a travel platform that facilitates high-end and luxurious travel giveaways with the vision to set a benchmark in the industry. The Wanderlust vision incorporates a one-stop solution for travel needs and accommodations along with building a recognized cryptocurrency token that can be used anywhere across the world.

Leveraging the fundamentals of blockchain technology, the Wanderlust platform provides a way to exhilarating experiences through travel giveaways. Built on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) network, it integrates WANDERLUST ($Wander) as the native utility token as the means to access the products and services of the Wanderlust ecosystem.

The Wanderlust ecosystem encompasses innovative products, including an NFT generator that offers wanderers a way to digitize their travel encounters and create a unique identity of the decentralized platform. In addition, we offer a merchandise store that caters to the needs of our wanderers.
